name: Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer.

Director.name: Jonathon Demme
Director.bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

genre.name: Horror
genre.description: Horror consists of setpieces designed to invoke fear and unease into the mind of the viewer.

name: Spider-Man
description: Young high school student Peter Parker finds himself with the powers of a spider, and must now juggle the responsiblities of being a hero and a teenager.

name: Evil Dead
description: College student Ash Williams suddenly finds himself in a sticky situation when he and his friends inadvertently release a demon from its slumber to terrorize them during a cabin retreat.

name: Wreck-it Ralph
description: Ralph is the main bad guy of his game Fix-it Felix. Wanting to rise above his station, he decides to journey outside his game to prove his worth as a hero.

Director.name: Rich Moore
Director.bio: Rich Moore is an American film and television animation director, screenwriter, and voice actor.

genre.name: Animation
genre.description: Animation is a method in which pictures are manipulated to apear as moving images. In traditional animation, images are drawn or painted by hand on transparent celluloid sheets to be photographed and exhibited on film.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: Former Ravager Peter Quill (AKA Star Lord) has gone his whole life working alone. Now faced with a threat that could end the entire galaxy, he must learn to lead a motley crew of misfits to battle the forces of evil and save the day.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Young teenager Miles Morales finds himself with powers after being bitten by a radioactive spider. Now with the multi-verse falling apart around him, Miles must band together with several other Spider-Men from across time and space to master his powers and prove his worth as a hero
